meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Giuliani Returning Donations The Giuliani Senate campaign will return $2.8 million to contributors and suggest that the money go to the Lazio Senate campaign.
Jubilation in Lebanon The Lebanese proudly celebrated a new holiday, National Resistance Day, with a joyous rally at what had been a notorious prison.
Giuliani Returning Donations The Giuliani Senate campaign will return $2.8 million to contributors and suggest that the money go to the Lazio Senate campaign.
Jubilation in Lebanon The Lebanese proudly celebrated a new holiday, National Resistance Day, with a joyous rally at what had been a notorious prison.
Doctors Sue Insurers The California Medical Association accused insurers of violating antiracketeering laws by interfering with doctor-patient relationships.
Meat Standards Rejected A federal judge in Texas struck down the Agriculture Department's inspection standards for meat-processing plants.
